    • Method Detail

      • acceptable

        public boolean acceptable(java.lang.String suggestion)
        Test if a given string is an acceptable password.
        Not acceptable: A word with less than 6 characters
        or a word that contains a space.
        Parameters:
        suggestion - Word that should be tested
        Returns:
        true If suggestion is acceptable

      • testWord

        public boolean testWord(java.lang.String test)
        Tests if a given word is equal to the current password.
        Parameters:
        test - Word that should be tested
        Returns:
        true If test is equal to the current password

      • setWord

        public boolean setWord(java.lang.String oldpass,
                       java.lang.String newpass)
        Changes this password.
        Parameters:
        oldpass - The current password
        newpass - The new password
        Returns:
        true if old is equal to the current password and that newpass is an acceptable password
